pageProps.data:
## Grayscale

###### Description

Grayscale of the input image by formula of luminosity
 R * 0.2126 + G * 0.7152 + B * 0.0722

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tSrc**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|The source image to be grayscaled.|

###### Example

```js
gm.grayscale(inputImage);
```
